trans-unit.source: Makes a request to a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: 对统一资源标识符 (URI) 发出请求。

trans-unit.source: This is an <see langword="abstract" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 <see langword="abstract" /> 类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> is the `abstract` base class for .NET's request/response model for accessing data from the Internet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> 是`abstract`基类。NET 的请求/响应模型，用于从 Internet 中访问数据。

trans-unit.source: An application that uses the request/response model can request data from the Internet in a protocol-agnostic manner, in which the application works with instances of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class while protocol-specific descendant classes carry out the details of the request.
trans-unit.target: 使用请求/响应模型的应用程序可以以协议不可知的方式，在其中应用程序处理的实例从 Internet 请求数据<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类时特定于协议的子代类执行的详细信息请求。

trans-unit.source: Requests are sent from an application to a particular URI, such as a Web page on a server.
trans-unit.target: 从为特定的 URI，例如 Web 页的服务器上的应用程序发送请求。

trans-unit.source: The URI determines the proper descendant class to create from a list of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendants registered for the application.
trans-unit.target: URI 确定要从列表中创建的正确子代类<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>后代注册应用程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendants are typically registered to handle a specific protocol, such as HTTP or FTP, but can be registered to handle a request to a specific server or path on a server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> 后代通常注册用于处理特定的协议，如 HTTP 或 FTP，但可以注册用于处理请求的特定服务器或服务器上的路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> when errors occur while accessing an Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类将引发<xref:System.Net.WebException>中发生错误时访问 Internet 资源时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property is one of the <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus> values that indicates the source of the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>属性是一个<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>值，该值指示错误的来源。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> is <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> property contains the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> received from the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>是<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>属性包含<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>收到来自 Internet 资源。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class is an `abstract` class, the actual behavior of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类是`abstract`类的实际行为<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例在运行时由子类由<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method to initialize new <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法初始化新<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If the application that creates the WebRequest object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so.
trans-unit.target: 与普通用户的凭据运行的应用程序创建 WebRequest 对象，如果应用程序将无法访问证书安装在本地计算机存储区中，除非权限已显式提供给用户若要这样做。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例，并返回该响应。

trans-unit.source: To access the requested URI or any URI that the request is redirected to.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问请求的 URI 或请求重定向到任何 URI。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Connect" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Connect" />。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Method" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Headers" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.ContentLength" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.ContentType" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.PreAuthenticate" />, <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream" />, <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />, <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream(System.IAsyncResult)" />, <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse" />, <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse(System.IAsyncResult)" />.
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />，必须重写以下成员： <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Method" />， <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri" />， <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Headers" />， <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.ContentLength" />， <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.ContentType" />， <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials" />， <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.PreAuthenticate" />， <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream" />， <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />， <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream(System.IAsyncResult)" /><see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse" />， <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse(System.IAsyncResult)" />。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you must provide an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate" /> interface, which defines the <see cref="M:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate.Create(System.Uri)" /> method used when you call <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.Create(System.Uri)" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你必须提供的一个实现<see cref="T:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate" />接口，该定义接口<see cref="M:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate.Create(System.Uri)" />方法在调用时使用<see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.Create(System.Uri)" />。

trans-unit.source: You must register the class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate" /> interface, using the <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix(System.String,System.Net.IWebRequestCreate)" /> method or the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 你必须注册实现的类<see cref="T:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate" />接口，使用<see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix(System.String,System.Net.IWebRequestCreate)" />方法或配置文件。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Notice that an application must run in full trust mode when using serialization.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用序列化时，必须在完全信任模式下运行应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Aborts the request.
trans-unit.target: 中止请求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Abort%2A> method cancels asynchronous requests to Internet resources started with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Abort%2A>方法取消对 Internet 资源入门的异步请求<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets values indicating the level of authentication and impersonation used for this request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于此请求的身份验证和模拟的级别。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel.MutualAuthRequested" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel.MutualAuthRequested" />。

trans-unit.source: In mutual authentication, both the client and server present credentials to establish their identity.
trans-unit.target: 在相互身份验证中，客户端和服务器双方都出示凭据以确定其身份。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel.MutualAuthRequired" /> and <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel.MutualAuthRequested" /> values are relevant for Kerberos authentication.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel.MutualAuthRequired" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel.MutualAuthRequested" /> 值与 Kerberos 身份验证有关。

trans-unit.source: Kerberos authentication can be supported directly, or can be used if the Negotiate security protocol is used to select the actual security protocol.
trans-unit.target: 可以直接支持 Kerberos 身份验证，也可以仅在使用 Negotiate 安全协议选择实际的安全协议时使用该身份验证。

trans-unit.source: For more information about authentication protocols, see [Internet Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342e87c-f672-4660-a513-41a2f2b80c4a).
trans-unit.target: 有关身份验证协议的详细信息，请参阅[Internet 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342e87c-f672-4660-a513-41a2f2b80c4a)。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether mutual authentication occurred, check the <see cref="P:System.Net.WebResponse.IsMutuallyAuthenticated" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定相互身份验证是否发生，请检查 <see cref="P:System.Net.WebResponse.IsMutuallyAuthenticated" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel.MutualAuthRequired" /> authentication flag value and mutual authentication does not occur, your application will receive an <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" /> with a <see cref="T:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException" /> inner exception indicating that mutual authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你指定了 <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel.MutualAuthRequired" /> 身份验证标志值，而未发生相互身份验证，则应用程序将收到一个带有 <see cref="T:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException" /> 内部异常的 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" />，指示相互身份验证失败。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法会启动用于将数据发送到 Internet 资源的流的异步请求。

trans-unit.source: The callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate uses the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method to return the request stream.
trans-unit.target: 实现的回调方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委托使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法以返回请求流。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.

trans-unit.source: If a WebException is thrown, use the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> properties of the exception to determine the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发 WebException，则会使用<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>异常来确定来自服务器的响应的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> to asynchronously request the target resource.

trans-unit.source: When the resource has been obtained, the specified callback method will be executed.
trans-unit.target: 当已获取资源时，将执行的指定的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to access the method, when the method is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该方法时，试图访问该方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cache policy for this request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此请求的缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> object that defines a cache policy.
trans-unit.target: 定义缓存策略的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The current cache policy and the presence of the requested resource in the cache determine whether a response can be retrieved from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 当前的缓存策略和缓存中请求的资源存在确定是否可以从缓存检索的响应。

trans-unit.source: Using cached responses usually improves application performance, but there is a risk that the response in the cache does not match the response on the server.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用缓存的响应可提高应用程序性能，但没有中缓存的响应与服务器上的响应不匹配的风险。

trans-unit.source: Default cache policy can be specified in the Machine.config configuration file or by setting the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.DefaultCachePolicy%2A> property for requests that use the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) or Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTPS) URI scheme.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定默认缓存策略，Machine.config 配置文件中或通过设置<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.DefaultCachePolicy%2A>使用超文本传输协议 (HTTP) 或安全超文本传输协议 (HTTPS) 的 URI 方案的请求的属性。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果资源的响应流是检索，并且读取到流末尾，资源的副本是仅添加到缓存。

trans-unit.source: So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request.
trans-unit.target: 因此相同的资源的另一个请求可以使用缓存的副本，具体取决于此请求的缓存策略级别。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the cache policy for a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 Web 请求的缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, gets or sets the name of the connection group for the request.
trans-unit.target: 当在子类中重写时，获取或设置请求的连接组的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the connection group for the request.
trans-unit.target: 请求的连接组的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A> property associates specific requests within an application to one or more connection pools.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A>属性将为一个或多个连接池的应用程序内的特定请求相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class is an `abstract` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类是`abstract`类。

trans-unit.source: The actual behavior of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 实际行为<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例在运行时由子类由<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to get or set the property, when the property is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该属性时，试图获取或设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName" /> property typically associates a group of requests that share a set of credentials with a connection to an Internet resource to avoid potential security failures.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName" />属性通常将一组与对 Internet 资源以避免潜在的安全失败的连接共享一组凭据的请求相关联。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI that identifies the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 标识 Internet 资源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> instance for the specified URI scheme.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的 URI 方案初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> descendant for the specific URI scheme.
trans-unit.target: 特定 URI 方案的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 子代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method returns a descendant of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class determined at run time as the closest registered match for `requestUri`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法返回的子代<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类在作为为最接近已注册的匹配项的运行时确定`requestUri`。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a URI beginning with `http://` or `https://` is passed in `requestUri`, an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> is returned by <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当以开头的 URI`http://`或`https://`传入`requestUri`、<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>返回<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If a URI beginning with `ftp://` is passed instead, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method will return a <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果以开头的 URI`ftp://`相反，传递<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法将返回<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>实例。

trans-unit.source: If a URI beginning with `file://` is passed instead, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method will return a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果以开头的 URI`file://`相反，传递<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法将返回<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>实例。

trans-unit.source: The pre-registered reserve types already registered include the following:
trans-unit.target: 已注册的预注册的保留类型包括：

trans-unit.source: .NET includes support for the `http://`, `https://`, `ftp://`, and `file://` URI schemes.
trans-unit.target: .NET 包括对支持`http://`， `https://`， `ftp://`，和`file://`URI 方案。

trans-unit.source: Custom <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendants to handle other requests are registered with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>后代以处理其他请求中注册的<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method uses the `requestUriString` parameter to create a <xref:System.Uri> instance that it passes to the new <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法使用`requestUriString`参数来创建<xref:System.Uri>将传递到新的实例<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [[\<topic://conUsingNetworkTracing>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e993b7c3-087f-45d8-9c02-9dded936d804).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ [ \<topic://conUsingNetworkTracing >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e993b7c3-087f-45d8-9c02-9dded936d804)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>来实例化<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>实例。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the target URL is used as the constructor parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示目标 URL 用作构造函数参数。

trans-unit.source: The request scheme specified in <paramref name="requestUriString" /> has not been registered.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestUriString" /> 中指定的请求方案尚未注册。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="requestUriString" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestUriString" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have permission to connect to the requested URI or a URI that the request is redirected to.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有连接到请求的 URI 或请求重定向到的 URI 的权限。

trans-unit.source: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c31e1663-c164-4e65-b66d-d3aa8750a154), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />, instead.
trans-unit.target: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c31e1663-c164-4e65-b66d-d3aa8750a154)中，改为捕获基类异常 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI specified in <paramref name="requestUriString" /> is not a valid URI.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestUriString" /> 中指定的 URI 不是有效的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> containing the URI of the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含请求的资源的 URI 的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> instance for the specified URI scheme.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的 URI 方案初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> descendant for the specified URI scheme.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 URI 方案的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 子代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method returns a descendant of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class determined at run time as the closest registered match for `requestUri`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法返回的子代<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类在作为为最接近已注册的匹配项的运行时确定`requestUri`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you create a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendant, Handler1, to handle requests to `http://www.contoso.com/text/` and another named Handler2 to handle requests to `http://www.contoso.com/code/`, you can use <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method to return the WebRequest descendant associated with either specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你创建<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>后代，Handler1，以处理向发出请求`http://www.contoso.com/text/`和另一个名为 Handler2 以处理向发出请求`http://www.contoso.com/code/`，你可以使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法以返回使用关联的 WebRequest 后代指定的 URI。

trans-unit.source: To return a descendant of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class based on only the scheme portion of a URI, use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateDefault%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要返回的子代<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类基于 URI 的方案部分，请使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateDefault%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a URI beginning with `http://` or `https://` is passed in `requestUri`, an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> is returned by <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当以开头的 URI`http://`或`https://`传入`requestUri`、<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>返回<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If a URI beginning with `ftp://` is passed instead, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method will return a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果以开头的 URI`ftp://`相反，传递<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法将返回<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>实例。

trans-unit.source: If a URI beginning with `file://` is passed instead, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method will return a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果以开头的 URI`file://`相反，传递<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法将返回<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>实例。

trans-unit.target: 已注册的预注册的保留类型包括：

trans-unit.source: When a URI that begins with `http://` or `http://` is passed in the `requestUriString` parameter, a <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> is returned by <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateHttp%28System.String%29>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> instance for the specific URI string.
trans-unit.target: 特定 URI 字符串的 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateHttp%28System.Uri%29> method returns an instance of the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class for the `requestUri`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateHttp%28System.Uri%29>方法返回的实例<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>类`requestUri`。

trans-unit.source: When a URI that begins with `http://` or `http://` is passed in the `requestUri` parameter, an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> is returned by <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateHttp%28System.Uri%29>.
trans-unit.target: 当一个 URI，开头`http://`或`http://`传入`requestUri`参数，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>返回<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateHttp%28System.Uri%29>。

trans-unit.source: Another other scheme will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 另一个其他方案将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateHttp%28System.Uri%29> method uses the `requestUri` parameter to create a new <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateHttp%28System.Uri%29>方法使用`requestUri`参数来创建一个新<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>实例。

trans-unit.source: If the method is successful, the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowReadStreamBuffering%2A> property on the returned <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> instance is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowReadStreamBuffering%2A>属性对返回<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>实例设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET includes support for the `http://` and `https://` URI schemes.
trans-unit.target: .NET 包括对支持`http://`和`https://`URI 方案。

trans-unit.source: Custom <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendants to handle other requests are registered with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>后代以处理其他请求中注册的<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%28System.Uri%29> method can be used to create a descendant of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class for other schemes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%28System.Uri%29>方法可以用于创建的子代<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>对于其他方案的类。

trans-unit.source: The request scheme specified in <paramref name="requestUri" /> is the http or https scheme.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestUri" /> 中指定的请求方案为 http 或 https 方案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="requestUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestUri" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have permission to connect to the requested URI or a URI that the request is redirected to.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有连接到请求的 URI 或请求重定向到的 URI 的权限。

trans-unit.source: The URI specified in <paramref name="requestUri" /> is not a valid URI.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestUri" /> 中指定的 URI 不是有效的 URI。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, gets the factory object derived from the <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate" /> class used to create the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> instantiated for making the request to the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 当在子类中重写时，获取从 <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate" /> 类派生的工厂对象，该类用于创建为生成对指定 URI 的请求而实例化的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />。

trans-unit.source: The derived <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> type returned by the <see cref="M:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate.Create(System.Uri)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate.Create(System.Uri)" /> 方法返回的派生 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: This property allows an application to determine which <xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate> derived factory object was used to create the request.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许应用程序来确定哪些<xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate>派生的工厂对象用于创建请求。

trans-unit.source: This object may be [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95)) or [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95)), but it may also be a custom instance derived from <xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate>.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可能[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95))或[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95))，但它也可能是派生自的自定义实例<xref:System.Net.IWebRequestCreate>。

trans-unit.source: This allows an application to determine whether the browser hosting [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)] client, or some custom object handles HTTP requests and responses for the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: 这允许应用程序以确定是否浏览器承载[!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)]客户端或某些自定义对象处理 HTTP 请求和响应<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A> method allows an application to configure which derived <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> type will be instantiated when making a request to a specific URI.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A>方法允许应用程序配置后者派生<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>到特定 URI 发出请求时，类型将被实例化。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> creators are typically registered to handle a specific protocol, such HTTP or HTTPS, but can be registered to handle a request to a specific server or path on a server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> 创建者通常注册用于处理特定的协议，此类的 HTTP 或 HTTPS，但可以注册用于处理请求的特定服务器或服务器上的路径。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when more than one derived <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> type can process requests for the same protocol.
trans-unit.target: 这是有用的当多个派生时<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类型可以处理相同的协议的请求。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[sil3_first](~/includes/sil3-first-md.md)] and later runtime supports multiple HTTP handlers each having different capabilities.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[sil3_first](~/includes/sil3-first-md.md)]和更高版本的运行时支持多个 HTTP 处理程序每个都具有不同的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, a web service that uses Representational State Transfer (REST) might require the [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95)) handler while a SOAP web service might be able to use the default [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95)) handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能需要使用具象状态传输 (REST) 的 web 服务[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95))而 SOAP web 服务可能能够使用默认值的处理程序[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95))处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, gets or sets the network credentials used for authenticating the request with the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 当在子类中被重写时，获取或设置用于对 Internet 资源请求进行身份验证的网络凭据。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.ICredentials" /> containing the authentication credentials associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: 包含与该请求关联的身份验证凭据的 <see cref="T:System.Net.ICredentials" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials%2A> property contains the authentication credentials required to access the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials%2A>属性包含所需访问 Internet 资源的身份验证凭据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class is an `abstract` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类是`abstract`类。

trans-unit.source: The actual behavior of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 实际行为<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例在运行时由子类由<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials%2A> property using the default credentials of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials%2A>使用当前用户的默认凭据的属性。

trans-unit.source: When the request is made, credentials stored in this property are used to validate the client.
trans-unit.target: 发出请求后，此属性中存储的凭据用于验证客户端。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to setting the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 这等同于设置<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to get or set the property, when the property is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该属性时，试图获取或设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cache policy for this request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此请求的默认缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy" /> that specifies the cache policy in effect for this request when no other policy is applicable.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy" />，它指定当没有其他策略适用时对此请求有效的缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: This policy is used for this request if the following conditions exist:
trans-unit.target: 此策略适用于此请求，如果满足下列条件：

trans-unit.source: There is no <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.DefaultCachePolicy%2A> property specified for this request.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.DefaultCachePolicy%2A>为此请求指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: The machine and application configuration files do not specify a cache policy that is applicable to the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) used to create this request.
trans-unit.target: 不适用到统一资源标识符 (URI) 的缓存策略用于创建此请求指定文件的计算机和应用程序配置。

trans-unit.source: The cache policy determines whether the requested resource can be taken from a cache instead of sending the request to the resource host computer.
trans-unit.target: 缓存策略将确定是否可以从缓存而不是将请求发送到的资源主机计算机获取请求的资源。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果资源的响应流是检索，并且读取到流末尾，资源的副本是仅添加到缓存。

trans-unit.source: So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request.
trans-unit.target: 因此相同的资源的另一个请求可以使用缓存的副本，具体取决于此请求的缓存策略级别。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the default cache policy for Web requests.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 Web 请求的默认缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: For unrestricted access to network resources.
trans-unit.target: 无限制地访问网络资源。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the global HTTP proxy.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置全局 HTTP 代理。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebProxy" /> used by every call to instances of <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 实例的每一次调用所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebProxy" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A> property gets or sets the global proxy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A>属性获取或设置全局代理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A> property determines the default proxy that all <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances use if the request supports proxies and no proxy is set explicitly using the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A>属性确定的默认代理的所有<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>如果请求支持的代理并使用显式设置任何代理，请使用实例<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Proxies are currently supported by <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 当前支持代理<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A> property reads proxy settings from the app.config file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A>属性从 app.config 文件中读取代理设置。

trans-unit.source: If there is no config file, the current user's Internet Explorer (IE) proxy settings are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有配置文件，将使用当前用户的 Internet Explorer (IE) 代理设置。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A> property is set to null, all subsequent instances of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class created by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> or <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateDefault%2A> methods do not have a proxy.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A>属性设置为 null，则所有后续的实例<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类创建的<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>或<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CreateDefault%2A>方法不会代理。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the global HTTP proxy.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置全局 HTTP 代理。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references a pending request for a stream.
trans-unit.target: 引用对流的挂起请求的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, returns a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for writing data to the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 当在子类中重写时，返回用于将数据写入 Internet 资源的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to write data to.
trans-unit.target: 将数据写入的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method completes an asynchronous stream request that was started by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法完成已由启动异步流请求<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To avoid timing issues with garbage collection, be sure to close the response stream by calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method on the stream returned by <xref:System.Net.WebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> after calling <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免与垃圾回收的计时问题，请务必通过调用关闭响应流<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>方法返回的流<xref:System.Net.WebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>之后调用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class is an `abstract` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类是`abstract`类。

trans-unit.source: The actual behavior of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 实际行为<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例在运行时由子类由<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取并使用通过调用的请求流<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method completes the asynchronous call to <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法完成对异步调用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to access the method, when the method is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该方法时，试图访问该方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references a pending request for a response.
trans-unit.target: 引用对响应的挂起请求的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, returns a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在子类中重写时，返回 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> that contains a response to the Internet request.
trans-unit.target: 包含对 Internet 请求的响应的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> method completes an asynchronous request for an Internet resource that was started with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>方法完成与用于启动对 Internet 资源的异步请求<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class is an `abstract` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类是`abstract`类。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>检索的目标资源。

trans-unit.target: 要填充数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定该序列化的目标的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用将目标对象序列化所需的数据填充 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for writing data to the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 用于将数据写入 Internet 资源的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method initiates a request to send data to the Internet resource and returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance for sending data to the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法发出的请求将数据发送到 Internet 资源，并返回<xref:System.IO.Stream>用于将数据发送到 Internet 资源的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method provides synchronous access to the <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法提供同步访问<xref:System.IO.Stream>。

trans-unit.target: 异步访问，请使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class is an `abstract` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类是`abstract`类。

trans-unit.source: The actual behavior of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 实际行为<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例在运行时由子类由<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method to obtain a stream and then writes data that stream.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法来获取流，然后将数据该流。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to access the method, when the method is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该方法时，试图访问该方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, returns a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for writing data to the Internet resource as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 当在子类中被重写时，将用于写入数据的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 作为异步操作返回到 Internet 资源。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 不会阻止此操作。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete when the <xref:System.IO.Stream> for writing data to the Internet resource is available.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>对象都完成时<xref:System.IO.Stream>资源可用于将数据写入 Internet。

trans-unit.source: After you call <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStreamAsync%2A>, make sure you close the request stream before you call <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponseAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用后<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStreamAsync%2A>，请确保你在调用之前关闭请求流<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponseAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, returns a response to an Internet request.
trans-unit.target: 当在子类中被重写时，返回对 Internet 请求的响应。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> containing the response to the Internet request.
trans-unit.target: 包含对 Internet 请求的响应的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method sends a request to an Internet resource and returns a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法将请求发送到 Internet 资源，并返回<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>实例。

trans-unit.source: If the request has already been initiated by a call to <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method completes the request and returns any response.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启动请求通过调用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>、<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法完成请求，并返回任何响应。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method provides synchronous access to the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法提供同步访问<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>。

trans-unit.source: For asynchronous access, use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 异步访问，请使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class is an `abstract` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类是`abstract`类。

trans-unit.source: The actual behavior of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 实际行为<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例在运行时由子类由<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: If a WebException is thrown, use the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> properties of the exception to determine the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发 WebException，则会使用<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>异常来确定来自服务器的响应的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout%2A> property to 10000 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout%2A>到 10000 毫秒的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the timeout period expires before the resource can be returned, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在超时期限过期之前可以返回该资源，<xref:System.Net.WebException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to access the method, when the method is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该方法时，试图访问该方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, returns a response to an Internet request as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 当在子代类中被重写时，将作为异步操作返回对 Internet 请求的响应。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 不会阻止此操作。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after a response to an Internet request is available.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>对象都完成后对 Internet 请求响应一旦可用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a proxy configured with the Internet Explorer settings of the currently impersonated user.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前模拟用户的 Internet Explorer 设置中配置的代理。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebProxy" /> used by every call to instances of <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 实例的每一次调用所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebProxy" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy%2A> method reads the current user's Internet Explorer (IE) proxy settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy%2A> 方法读取当前用户的 Internet Explorer (IE) 代理设置。

trans-unit.source: This process includes the IE options to automatically detect proxy settings, use an automatic configuration script, manual proxy server settings, and advanced manual proxy server settings.
trans-unit.target: 此过程包括自动检测代理设置，使用自动配置脚本，手动代理服务器设置的 IE 选项和高级手动代理服务器设置。

trans-unit.source: If your application is impersonating several users, you can use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy%2A> method to retrieve a proxy for each impersonated user.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序正在模拟多个用户，则可以使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy%2A>方法来检索其中的每个模拟用户的代理。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the global HTTP proxy.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置全局 HTTP 代理。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.target: 当在子类中被重写时，获取或设置与请求关联的标头名称/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> containing the header name/value pairs associated with this request.
trans-unit.target: 包含与此请求关联的标头名称/值对的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Headers%2A> property contains a <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> instance containing the header information to send to the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Headers%2A>属性包含<xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>包含标头信息将发送到 Internet 资源的实例。

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level determines how the server can use the client's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 模拟级别确定服务器可以如何使用客户端的凭据。

trans-unit.source: If the property is not overridden in a descendant class, any attempt is made to get or set the property.
trans-unit.target: 在子类中未重写该属性的情况下，试图获取或设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Method" /> property can contain any valid request method for the protocol implemented.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Method" />属性可以包含实现的协议的任何有效的请求方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value must provide a default request/response transaction that does not require protocol-specific properties to be set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值必须提供一个不需要设置特定于协议的属性的默认请求/响应事务。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, indicates whether to pre-authenticate the request.
trans-unit.target: 当在子类中被重写时，指示是否对请求进行预身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to pre-authenticate; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行预身份验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the first request, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A> property indicates whether to send authentication information with subsequent requests without waiting to be challenged by the server.
trans-unit.target: 第一个请求，除了<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A>属性指示是否要发送的后续请求的身份验证信息，而无需等待服务器的质询。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> waits for an authentication challenge before sending authentication information.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>发送身份验证信息之前等待的身份验证质询。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A> property to `true` so that the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> stored in the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials%2A> property will be sent to along with the resource request.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A>属性`true`以便<xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>存储在<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials%2A>属性将随资源请求一起发送到。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 子代为其提供服务的完整 URI 或 URI 前缀。

trans-unit.target: 创建方法，<see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 调用它以创建 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 子代。

trans-unit.source: Registers a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> descendant for the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的 URI 注册 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 子代。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if registration is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果注册成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A> method registers <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendants to service requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A>方法寄存器<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>为请求提供服务的后代。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendants are typically registered to handle a specific protocol, such HTTP or FTP, but can be registered to handle a request to a specific server or path on a server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> 后代通常注册用于处理特定的协议，此类的 HTTP 或 FTP，但可以注册用于处理请求的特定服务器或服务器上的路径。

trans-unit.source: The pre-registered reserve types already registered include the following:
trans-unit.target: 已注册的预注册的保留类型包括：

trans-unit.source: Duplicate prefixes are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允许重复的前缀。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A> returns `false` if an attempt is made to register a duplicate prefix.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A> 返回`false`如果尝试注册重复的前缀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class is registered to service requests for HTTP and HTTPS schemes by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>类已注册到 HTTP 和 HTTPS 方案的服务请求，默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to register a different <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> descendant for these schemes will fail.
trans-unit.target: 尝试注册不同<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>这些方案的后代将失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri%2A> property to determine the site originally requested.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检查<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri%2A>属性来确定最初请求的站点。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to get or set the property, when the property is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该属性时，试图获取或设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri" /> must contain the original <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance passed to the <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.Create(System.Uri)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri" /> 必须包含原始<see cref="T:System.Uri" />实例传递给<see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.Create(System.Uri)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: If the protocol is able to redirect the request to a different URI to service the request, the descendant must provide a property to contain the URI that actually services the request
trans-unit.target: 如果能够将请求重定向到不同的 URI 来为请求提供服务的协议，后代必须提供要包含实际服务请求的 URI 的属性

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />, which holds the serialized data for the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 的序列化数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含与新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 关联的序列化流的目标。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance with the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在子代类中重写时，使用序列化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 所需要的数据来填充 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to serialize the object, when the interface is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子代类中重写该接口时，尝试序列化该对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of time, in milliseconds, before the request times out.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置请求超时之前的时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the request times out, or the value <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> to indicate that the request does not time out. The default value is defined by the descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 请求超时前的时间长度（以毫秒为单位）或指示请求不超时的 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> 值。默认值是由子代类定义的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout%2A> property indicates the length of time, in milliseconds, until the request times out and throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout%2A>属性指示的总时间，以毫秒为单位，直到请求超时，则将引发<xref:System.Net.WebException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout%2A> property affects only synchronous requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout%2A>属性会影响仅使用发出同步请求<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To time out asynchronous requests, use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Abort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 超时异步请求到使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Abort%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class is an `abstract` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>类是`abstract`类。

trans-unit.source: The actual behavior of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 实际行为<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>实例在运行时由子类由<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout%2A> property to 10000 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout%2A>到 10000 毫秒的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the timeout period expires before the resource can be returned, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在超时期限过期之前可以返回该资源，<xref:System.Net.WebException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to get or set the property, when the property is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该属性时，试图获取或设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: Descendant classes signal a timeout by throwing a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Net.WebException.Status" /> field set to <see cref="F:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.Timeout" />.
trans-unit.target: 子代类通过引发指示超时<see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" />与<see cref="P:System.Net.WebException.Status" />字段设置为<see cref="F:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.Timeout" />。

trans-unit.source: When <see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> the descendant class does not time out.
trans-unit.target: 当<see cref="P:System.Net.WebRequest.Timeout" />设置为<see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />子代类将不会超时。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a descendant class, gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that controls whether <see cref="P:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials" /> are sent with requests.
trans-unit.target: 当在子代类中重写时，获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值控制 <see cref="P:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials" /> 是否随请求一起发送。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the default credentials are used; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用默认凭据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` when requests made by this <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`true`时发出的此请求<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>对象，如果请求服务器进行身份验证应使用当前登录用户的凭据。

trans-unit.source: For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 对于客户端应用程序，这是在大多数情况下所需的行为。

trans-unit.source: For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials%2A> property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made.
trans-unit.target: 对于中间层应用程序，例如 ASP.NET 应用程序，而不是使用此属性，通常会设置<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Credentials%2A>到客户端的名义发出的请求的凭据的属性。

trans-unit.source: You attempted to set this property after the request was sent.
trans-unit.target: 你试图在发送请求后设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt is made to access the property, when the property is not overridden in a descendant class.
trans-unit.target: 当未在子类中重写该属性时，尝试访问该属性。
